bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions with a flaming, painful swelling developing when fingernails or toenails grow too long and enter the flesh, or when one cuts one’s nails and injures the flesh. Serious cases are associated with putrescence. Pu ji fang 普濟方 300: 治嵌甲生入肉，常出血疼痛 , “To cure embedded nails that have grown into the flesh. They are often accompanied by bleeding and pain”.
